title: Disappointed - Half the size & Stale
text:
Ordered for me and my daughter for Christmas treat.
We don't buy candy often.
Live in mountain resort town.
Snow and ice this time of year.
So I was looking forward to getting this box of assorted candy.
Have bought these candies in store.
In the decorator bags, candies were large and fresh and flaky. Have tried several flavors from store all very good.
But these just arrived yesterday.
Spent over $20.00 with tax.
These candies looked great in case.
But each one was completely wrapped in foil.
Funny packaging reminded me of potato chips now you open bag and get half. Bag is full of air.
The foil wrapped around each was too much and hard to open.
Candies were good, but very small, tasted slightly old.
Not worth $20.00 dollars.

title: This is excellent
text:
Rondnoir is my absolute favorite here. I love how crunchy they are and I love the chocolate sprinkles on the outside. They taste fantastic and fancy.

Original is my second favorite. They're classic. It's like a crunchy candy with hazelnut spread on the inside. Delicious.

Raffaello are still good. I love the coconut, but they can definitely get very messy. They're a nice contrast to the chocolate and hazelnut flavors.

Good collection, but a little pricey for candy.

title: Arrived packed in a box that held in a styrofoam box with ice pack! Miami, FL
text:
These are one of my favorite chocolate candies, especially the coconut flavored. Yummy! All flavors are fresh, delicious, and individually wrapped. The plastic candy box is sturdy and can be easily opened and closed. I bought this as a gift for my dad, but since I couldn’t resist trying the new flavors (new to me), I ate quite a few. LOL! Now, I need to order another 48 piece for Dad when the price goes back to what I paid, approximately $26.

PACKED NOT TO MELT: I was worried if they would arrive melted since it’s always hot and these were not shipped from our local Amazon warehouse. These were shipped via UPS. Arrived packed in a box that held in a covered styrofoam box with a frozen ice pack! The outer box was marked PERISHABLES. Miami, FL. Yes, a box within a box.

title: The Trifecta of Ferrero!
text:
This purchase was also an Amazon clip & save coupon. I got these for my daughter Mara who is in college now. So when she comes to visit on Easter Break this is what I'm giving her. She obviously too old for an Easter Basket, but never too old for Ferrero. It's a lovely gift box collection of three of Ferrero's finest layered confections: Rondoir, Rocher, and Raffaello.
ROCHER -creamy, chocolaty filling surrounding a whole hazelnut, within a delicate, crisp wafer all enveloped in milk chocolate and finely chopped hazelnuts.
RONDOIR - unique combination of a creamy dark chocolate surrounding a hazelnut within a delicate, crisp wafer topped with crunchy dark chocolate morsels.
RAFFAELLO -an almond surrounded by a fine milk cream, then covered with a crisp, delicate wafer and sprinkled with tender shredded coconut.
This is a Great Gift for a Great Daughter - the Trifecta of Ferrero!

title: So delectable!
text:
I have always been a fan of Ferrero Rocher chocolates and I didn't even know that other varieties existed. This box comes with Rondnoir (made in Italy), Rocher (made in Canada) and Garden (made in Germany) chocolates.
The Rondnoir consists of almonds in dark chocolate and a wafer covered with dark chocolate bits. The Rocher consists a hazelnut in milk chocolate and a wafer. The Garden consists of an almond surrounded by coconut cream and a wafer dipped in coconut flakes - the Garden variety are very sweet and they'd make a great mini-dessert instead of coconut cream pie. This collection of three varieties is a perfect and elegant gift for someone who likes chocolate confections of all sorts.

title: For Soda Lovers without the HFCS
text: If you're like me, and you're moderately health conscious, you enjoy sodas. These sodas are all natural and are the only ones that do not include artificial sweeteners or High Fructose Corn Syrup (HFCS). Artificial sweeteners and HFCS are unhealthy. Research it! Also, the flavor is fantastic. So far, I've enjoyed the Sanpellegrino Aranciata (orange) and have ordered two other flavors. Coke recently came out with a soda called Coke Life with cane sugar and no artificial sweeteners or HFCS, but I can no longer find it.  I give this product from Italy 5-Stars.

title: Yum!!!
text: I bought this because I know I like the original Ferrero Rocher flavor (milk chocolate).  And I’m a huge fan of dark chocolate, so it was no surprise to me that I really like those.  But the big surprise to me was the white chocolate coconut.  I figured I’d give those away.  I love coconut but I’m no fan of white chocolate.  Pretty much any white chocolate and no matter what else is with it, I’ll pass because all I can taste is the white chocolate.  So I was very pleasantly surprised when I tried the white chocolate coconut flavor and LOVED it!  That one is probably my favorite of the bunch!

My hardest decision is whether to buy the variety box or the usual one.  With the variety box, there is an assortment and, I do like the coconut ones, too, but not as much as the hazelnut ones.  It's a great chocolate candy.  What more can I say.  It's what my husband buys our daughter on Valentines Day every year because she loves it and she never hesitates opening it immediately and eating some right away.  I heard her tell her young daughters that it's medicine when they wanted some. : -) ..... and, otherwise, she is a very generous person.

title: Give these a 3 leaning towards 4. Advertised as Chocolates but really, not so much - Good Taste tho!
text:
The advertising is pretty misleading. First the good news. They taste really good. Also good news - you ain't gonna get fat eating these. The not so good news: Not a lot of chocolate. These are cleverly made puff balls with a thin hard outer shell with chocolate and other stuff. Lots of fine shaved dried coconut and nut in the shell. The inside is more or less hollow - filled with some kind of food foam - mostly air. These are very tasty - but I found myself wanting to eat 4 or more just to get the equivilent (maybe) of one normal filled chocolate.
Very misleading but OK value, I guess, for 35 cents apiece, but not what I was looking for nor expected.

title: For those that never tasted,
text:
When I bought these I tried to find out what they tasted like cause I didn't want to buy something I never tried online.

Gold wrapper: is like a milk chocolate crunch outer layer(sorta like a crunch bar but thinner), then the filling is a milky chocolate with slight hazelnut taste and a added surprise nut. I don't like hazelnut flavor but these are great!

Dark brown wrapper: has tiny choc beads on the outside and is drizzled with choc. On top. The filling is a smooth milky choc with a almost like m&m on the inside. See pics for details

White wrapper: is a white choc and coconut dipped outer layer with a wafer like 2nd layer and the inside filling is a white milky smooth choc, that is so creamy and good. With a added walnut surprise.

They are ALL worth trying! I added pics of outside and inside of each of the chocolates unwrapped so you can see exactly what is in those wrappers! If you cant see all the pics scroll up at the top of the reveiws and click see more pics, they should be in there. Also the case for the variety box is this cool clear plastic container that I can't wait to recycle into something like a jewelry box!!!

title: Beautifull and Delicious!!
text: I first had the coconut candies in Austria in 2000.  That was before they were available in the US -- or before I ever saw them here.  For nostalgic reasons, I ordered the assorted chocolates with the coconut candies that I fell in love with so long ago.  I'm pretty sure my eyes rolled back in my head as the candy melted in my mouth.  I gave one to my partner who had never had one before and he had the very same experience.  Now I've tried them all (just received them two hours ago) and I have already ordered them again because they will not last long in this house.  I must say, they also took great care in shipping with a styrofoam container and ice pack.  Even though the ice had completely melted, the candy was in good shape.  Thank you!!

title: These are a crowd pleaser
text: Let me say first, I don't eat chocolate. Well, to be fair, only a little bit. Chocolate chip cookies, Peanut M&Ms, fun size Snickers, and the greatest creation in the history of food, the Reese's Peanut Butter Cup (which must have a secret ingredient because its is impossible to resist), are about it for me. But..... wait for it..... Ferrero Rocher is an item that, hands down, is a guaranteed smile. The packaging is very pleasing to the eye and very gift like. The portion size pieces are perfect. The colorful foil delights the ones who opens it. Of course, as I have been told, the product is delicious and exceeds the presentation. The beautiful thing about the 12 and 24 packs are that they are a very affordable way to bring a smile to someones day. For just a few dollars, you get a delivery truck to their door, they get a "mystery box", the suspense heightens, they open it, and take out this beautiful and shiny box of chocolates. Then the best part, they eat it, they love it, and they smile. You have just turned someone's frown upside down. You probably sent it to cheer them up. What you did was completely change their mood, and the rest of their day. Whatever was bothering them, just got a little easier to deal with. Its because you also took advantage of the gift option to write a short personal note, which is free, and you said, "I was thinking of you", or "I love you", or "I am sorry for your pain". You have the power for just around $6 to $10, to make a difference in someone's day. A small price to pay for the rich dividend it brings. It won't bring world peace, but if you can just win one heart, get one smile, share one joyful or empathetic tear with someone you love, or someone that need your love, you have started a trend that will cause others to see how little effort it takes to make a difference. Pick someone you know that needs to be loved, or pick two and send the 12 packs instead of 24. 12 pack of chocolates, about $6. 24 pack, about $11. Making a difference to someone who needs your love, PRICELESS!! I am Spartacus, and I approved this message.

title: Wonderful Chocolate Assortment
text:
These are so GOOD! I love all three kinds included and its nice to have an assortment for when you want dark chocolate or something with coconut, though my favorite happens to be chocolate hazelnut. It has the most marvelous combination of dark chocolate flavor and hazelnut with the crunchy outside, the smooth chocolate inside, and the actual nut at the center. Its just perfection.

The flavor of these chocolates is wonderful, rich and creamy and crunchy all together, and the white ones have a nice smooth taste to them, as well, made even better with the coconut. This assortment of chocolates are made to be savored, and I do...mmmmm....

They are also in very pretty wrapping that keeps them well. I've put them into crystal bowls on the table for parties or in a ceramic sled under the table-top Christmas tree or a single one looks very nice placed in a little basket at each person's setting at the table. I've bought these for gifts and for myself. I think they make for a really nice holiday present.

Highly highly recommended. These are quite reasonably priced for very good quality chocolates that should satisfy most chocolate lovers among your friends or family.

title: I think the assortment has somthing for everyone
text: I got these for Mom for Mother’s Day with a book, and a heating blanket. 😃 😂 She deserved and loved! The variety is fun and festive. A special added bonus. Unlike some mixes this one doesn’t have a flavor people avoid. They are quite popular but if you never had one it has great textures, crunch chew cream snap on every variety. Any cooking or baking or chocolate creating you can bet getting all that detail makes a difference.  A reliable economical treat most people who like chocolate love.Dark chocolate, coconut, and milk hazelnut . With Pandemic I have used online businesses far more than I ever would have . I sent most gifts by mail and these arrived unmelted and in perfect freshness for my Mom.

title: Love these!
text:
Keep them away, too good! Perfect gifts if you can get them wrapped before consuming them.
Shipped in shrink wrap, very secure. I am shocked to see some reviews mentioning broken & stale.
I have ordered numerous of two sizes. There is never bubble wrap but the case itself is so tight, and taped so securely that the candy cannot budge. Broken plastic case, apparently some have been delivered cracked or broken. I'd be interested to learn if these complaints might live in the same delivery zone? Somewhere that delivery personnel have problems? I'm ordering some again, & will hope for the best. I'd love if the company would pkg (my favorite) the coconut flavor in seperate boxes. But then, I'd just order more of it all.

title: Best loved gift for everyone on your list!  PSgood news to Lana Rose review on the coconut....
text:
Great price for great candy. They are vacuum sealed for shipping & not one was loose in the container. I bought 3 of this (24) size for possible extra guests. The container is so pretty & bright, it is already gift-able! Stick a large bow on it & your guest will feel very special! It took longer than expected to arrive. In previous years they arrived within 3-4 days. Maybe just recent shipping problems but you might order early. Some reviews mentioned stale, but in the several years I have purchased, luckily all have been fresh.
PS to Lana from Okla: My favorite also, is the coconut! They do sell the coconut only, from same company:
Ferrero Raffaello Premium Gourmet White Almond, Cream and Coconut, Candy

title: A person that also heavily depends on reviews, reviewing.
text: Used this product as some little Christmas gifts for family. I ordered three all together. The packaging was much more elegant than I anticipated. It resembles glass but is detailed hard structured plastic that is kind of "crystal-like". The platter of chocolates are large with three flavors all organized nicely. I've tasted each flavor and I have to say, I'm not a chocolate fan but job well done. The coconut was not too over powering and did not leave a horrid after taste as some do. Under the coconut shaving was "gold". The dark and hazelnut were also well executed and I did adore the crunchy outside with a nice not over powering gooey inside. The candies slightly melt in your mouth and are not too over bearing for those with sensitive teeth or not fond of hard chocolates/ chocolates that need to be followed up with a beverage to wash away. I do not post many reviews unless I am 100% satisfied/dissatisfied with the product. Definitely will purchase again for many more small gifts in the future. Great for bosses/coworkers/friends/family/spouses/siblings, etc.

title: Pretty good, bad timing
text: I bought them as a gift for Mother’s Day, they weren’t shipped very timely since I had ordered them two weeks ago and they arrived on Mother’s Day. The expected date I was given before I ordered, was not the same a few days after I actually ordered it. It is a 3rd party product so I was unable to cancel the order when I realized how late it would arrive. I don’t blame Amazon, but be mindful of timing when ordering. It was very satisfactory when it arrived aside from the small crack on the bottom, a little disappointing for a gift but nothing too bad. Other people have had more severe cracks in theirs. They taste great and I’m not upset enough to leave an awful review, just an informed one.

title: Absolutely delicious 😋
text: Bought these for myself and my husband. They didn't disappoint. Presentation was very nice if I wanted to gift it. I've had the hazelnut one and love it. The dark chocolate one is very good as well if you like dark chocolate. It doesn't have the nut in the middle but instead a ball of delicious, creamy, dark chocolate. I was skeptical of the white coconut one but both my husband and I were pleasantly surprised. I think the quality of the creamy filling really makes these (I don't think it's white chocolate 🤔). We both like the coconut best, not that the others aren't delicious. Great, quality confections. If you gift these the person receiving them will definitely know you think they're special.

title: HEAVEN IN A CANDY!
text: I'm sorry to admit the almost empty lovely gift package of mine, above, is only 2 days after delivery. And only 1 day since I hid it from myself. First time I've ever had these candies. Not only is it a beautiful presentation in a clear hard plastic diamond box?  Or that it was well priced? But the COCONUT flavor ones are out of this world! Next? Dark chocolate and last? My heretofore favorite milk chocolate? 3rd. There are succulently flavored soft hazelnut centers with a tiny whole hazelnut inside each. Coated in light wafer, then dipped delicately into chocolate covers. Layer upon layer of elegance. I am telling you, do NOT hesitate to order these. And do yourself a flavor? Order 2. 1 for You; 1 for whomever it is you love and want to gift chocolates to. Divine. Truly. Divine.

title: Lovely gift for mom
text:
I liked that my mom received these chocolates by surprise. LOL she wondered who they were from (I didn't tell her that I bought her these hehehehe) and she started enjoying them...but then she was worried that they may have been poisoned, God forbid, so she stopped eating them and asked around if others had sent her the chocolates.
Anyway, I called her later that day and told her that I sent them to her and we both laughed so much because she didn't bother to wait before eating a few, even though she normally is cautious about what she consumes (especially if its unannounced and received by mail).
She loves chocolate!
:-)

title: Very Nice! Came Fast!
text: The Ferrero Collection Fine Hazelnut Milk Chocolate and Coconut Assorted Confections is a perfect gift for Valentine's Day, or any special occasion. The 24-count assortment comes packaged in a beautiful diamond-shaped gift box, making it a great presentation. The chocolates inside are made with high-quality ingredients, including hazelnuts and coconut, which provide a rich, creamy and delicious taste. The chocolate is smooth and melts in your mouth, the hazelnut filling is perfectly balanced and the coconut adds a nice twist to the traditional chocolate taste. The assortment includes a variety of shapes and sizes, adding to the overall appeal. Overall, this collection of chocolates is a great choice for anyone looking for a special and delicious gift for a loved one.

title: Showcased Delightful Treat !!!
text: The 24-count gift boxed assortment is elegant to look upon and delicious to consume. These fine hazelnut confections from Ferrero practically melt in your mouth. Having loved the classic "Rocher" for years, the difference of the other (2) varieties are fresh to experience and enjoy. The "Rondnoir" with its dark chocolate, wafer shell and milk chocolaty filling is heavenly decadent in smooth embodiment. The "Raffaello" is light and crisp with coconut adorned white chocolate ?? with almonds...delicate and delicious. This gift-boxed collection is a winner for variety!!

title: Yum chocolate!
text:
I love Ferrero candies, but the wrapping on the dark chocolate and the white one are awful, very difficult to remove. This is the first time I have seen this wrapping on any of their products, so Ferrero if this is a new idea please change back!! The wrapping has like a cellophane and a metallic layer that are sealed together around the edges encompassing the chocolate candy. I didn't think to take a picture until after I ate them all (no, not all in one sitting.... ummm maybe two). Candy is delicious, the boxing is classy, only issue is the individual wrappings.

I worked for Ferrero for a short time before I retired and can attest to their commitment to quality ingredients and products.

title: Makes a great gift for groups because they are so well protected and there are 3 kinds
text:
I don't like hazelnuts and while I've seen the gold-foil version for years I had never seen the 2 other flavors until I saw a couple of packages like this. I don't eat candy much and I don't know what the other 2 flavors are like but what sealed the deal for me was: There is a place where I go once a week for a medical test and the folks there are terrific, and I wanted to get something to say thank you. Given the kind of place it is, and the pandemic, I also wanted something that several people could share and not worry about germs and such, which is realistic at that location.

Because this had 48 pieces in 3 flavors AND is covered in plastic shrink-wrap when you get it AND each piece is individually wrapped this seemed ideal for that purpose.

Also, in Aug I was afraid to buy it (too hot to transport chocolate) but then a banner appeared saying that if you bought from Amazon (rather than a 3rd-party seller) they would guarantee cold-box shipment. I gave it a shot and they came nicely boxed (with insulation) and with one of those cold-pack things that start out frozen. In our worst Aug weather the box arrived and the cold pack was still cool. Not cold, but nicely cool, which means that it had done its job. Kudos to Amazon for getting that right.

title: Happy gaining pounds with this!!
text:
Ferrero never disappoints and I am quite happy gaining pounds with it :) This was a multipack and included some different varieties besides the regular rocher. The pack included:
Rocher- the regular chocolaty filling surrounding the traditional whole hazelnut, within a delicate, crisp wafer and enveloped in milk chocolate and finely chopped hazelnuts. Yum!
Rondoir- creamy dark chocolate surrounding a hazelnut within a delicate, crisp wafer topped with crunchy dark chocolate morsels. My fav!!!
Raffaello- an almond surrounded by a fine milk cream and covered with a crisp, delicate wafer and sprinkled with shredded coconut. Uniquely tasty!
Got a great deal on Black Friday which made it perfect for indulging during the holidays! Attached some pics for reference (this is all I had left ;)).

title: Really good chocolate and the plastic case can be used as an aquarium lid!
text: These chocolates are extremely good and I can confirm both the 42 and 48 count are exactly the same size boxes. I ordered both thinking maybe one was a little bigger but the hard plastic cases are exactly the same size. I ordered them for the plastic cases so I could use them as aquarium lids on my fish tanks. The pic is on a 20 gallon tank. If you use both the top and bottom of the case there's only about a 2" gap left on the one edge. They also kinda fit 10 gallon aquariums and my 15 gallon tall aquarium as well with just a little overhang. I was also thinking about using these as mini greenhouse nurseries to start seeds. They are pretty short so would have to transplant them very quickly so I might just continue to use my plastic potato salad container I flip upside-down so they have a good 1-2" to grow before having to transplant my seedlings.

title: Too Tart for Me
text:
I didn't really know what to expect, but from all of the positive reviews, I thought I should try this. WOW! I didn't expect it to have such a sour kick. It really made me pucker. It's has such a tart taste...and aftertaste. I don't think there's anything wrong with the beverage. It's just not for me. I'm truly disappointed. It's just too acidic and sour for my taste. I'll give the rest away...someone else is bound to enjoy this.

Simply put, if you don't like tart candy (the ones children enjoy) you're not going to like this beverage.

title: Poor quality control?
text:
The first lot I ordered was lovely. It (Aranciata) was a good flavor, and nicely bitter; almost like liquid bitter orange marmalade and I would have given it 5 stars. I liked it so much, I ordered it again. But, alas, apparently there are some quality control issues because the first can I opened had an odd aroma and an even odder flavor. It went down the sink and the rest will probably go in the garbage. I'll try the Blood Orange flavor again, because that was good, but I doubt that I will take a chance on ordering the Aranciata in the future.

I'm editing this to say that the rest will go down the drain. I had hoped to exchange it, but apparently, that's not possible, so I will definitely have to think twice before ordering another San Pellegrino product. Too bad.

The price was right - chocolate lovers REJOICE! Buy this!

title: Quality , Quality , Quality
text:
These small bites are packed with flavor . If you’ve never tried them you won’t be disappointed. This box you have all three flavors . Coconut isn’t overpowering and cream. Regular is smooth with a perfect nut in the middle . Chocolate is a light crunch with silky chocolate cream with a surprise in the middle .
The best part of this box , there’s enough for sharing ( buy one for yourself for later ) , having people over for the holidays ( any day ) set a box out . The case is pretty all in its own , plus you don’t have to wash anything. Keep the box for other items or give to children for storing . If you’d like a higher level of grace fill a vase in flavor levels ..

I keep two bottles of seltzer water half full then pour have the can in one and half the can in the other so I'm content with that.

title: Ferrero Rocher!  The Fanciest Chistmas Candy For Everyone!
text: Ferrero Rocher has an assortment of their incredible fancy foil wrapped treats suitable for everyone's individual tastes. My personal favorite is JUST chocolate, and more chocolate!  Just the right combination of chocolate and hazelnut in perfect proportion to make you "Oh!" your way through these incredibly addictive candies. You'll find it hard to eat just one or two at a time, because while they're rich, they're also so uniquely different, beyond the combination of taste and presentation seen in average Christmas candies that are on the market today. Not your average stocking stuffer goody, Ferrero Rocher delivers much more than a Christmas candy. The outer hard coating of chocalate covered with flecks of nuts conceals a delectably rich inner mantle of luscious milk chocolate, surrounding a thin sweet layer of wafer. This covers the center, a magnificent hazelnut, to satisfy everyone's need for crunch!  The combination taken all together makes the whole Holiday seem worth it, so you better have more than one tray available if you're having guests over!

title: Yum!
text: The Ferraro Rocher fine hazelnut chocolate collection arrived just as pictured and described. The expiration is March 2023 but half are already gone so the close expiration doesn’t matter. Besides, expiration dates are not usda required and are sorely at the discretion of the manufacturer who have much interest in labeling products to expire much sooner than they should. All an expiration/best by date does is tell you the peak flavor and freshness of the product and after the date has lapsed the company cannot guarantee it. All 3 flavors are exquisite. They melt in your mouth and the layers of nuts, chocolate and wafer go perfectly together. Im not big on coconut because of it’s grainy texture but I love how it’s not too overpowering or intense. This 48 piece box makes a nice gift seeing as it comes in a hard, clear box. Each piece is individually wrapped for freshness. I will certainly be purchasing more of these for myself and to give as gifts. Highly recommended.

title: What's Pictured Is Not What I Received
text: I was offered a sample Ferrero box to review as a Vine Voice.  The box offered -- and pictured here -- was for a three-flavor assortment of chocolate and coconut candies:  Rafaello, Rocher, and Randnoir.  The box I actually received contained only Ferrero Rocher which is a truffle-like confection with a creamy chocolate filling containing a whole hazelnut at its center.  The filling is contained within "a delicate crisp wafer" and enveloped in a coating of milk chocolate and finely chopped hazelnuts.  The presentation box is quite lovely, and nicer than is apparent from the photograph here -- it's a heavy crystal-clear plastic case with a sturdy golden plastic liner which cradles the individual candies.  Each of the Rocher pieces is wrapped individually in gold foil, so the box of candy would make a nice impression as a holiday or hostess gift.  The heavy plastic case is smooth and very pleasant to hold.  The candy was shipped in an Amazon box with no protective cushioning, so unfortunately one of the bottom corners of the case was cracked.  BTW, it wasn't obvious how to open the box -- it's actually sealed with a strip of gold foil tape going all the way around the four sides of the box.  I finally found a small tab at the lower left-hand corner to begin peeling the tape away.  The top and bottom halves of the case then separate easily.  They fasten back together with a little bit of a snap, but the box won't hold together if you pick it up by the lid alone.  If it matters to you, serving size is 2 pieces for 150 calories per serving.

title: Should have bought extras...
text: I wish I had gotten two of these so I could have one all to myself! I've had these with the three variations before but these just seemed extra delicious. Granted, I haven't had them in awhile but it's not like it was going to be a surprise when I tasted them. The dark chocolate ones aren't bitter like a lot of dark chocolate. The coconut ones always reminded me of a coconut cream pie with a little crispy wafer crust. Yummy! And the hazelnut-chocolate ones were just as divine. Love them all. Fresh, crispy where it needed to be, chocolate is creamy where it should be, and nuts are crunchy and fresh. Excuse me. I need a Ferrero. :::Paper rustling::: :::Yum sounds coming from kitchen:::

text:
The hazelnut and the coconut ones are absolutely delicious but the dark chocolate ones are my least favorite. Which is weird cause I love dark chocolate. The dark chocolate ones also need a nut in the center. The coconut has an almond. The hazelnut... has a hazelnut (of course.) Maybe a pistachio? or a macadamia nut with the dark chocolate? Just spit balling. What do you think Ferrero co.?
Anyway they are delicious!
I wish they made a package like this with JUST the hazelnut and coconut ones together though!
Buy them. You will love them.
Ferrero candies are awesome.

title: So what did you mess up?
text:
Forget a Mother-in-law's birthday? Miss your wife's anniversary? What about trying to score some brownie points for the next time you make a mistake?

This is a good option. It isn't too expensive or large, but still big enough that it shows you didn't just run to Wally World to try to smooth things out.

Key things to consider about this purchase:
1. Is the female in your life that you have angered allergic to chocolate or nuts? If so, avoid this and find another way to dig out of that hole you are in.

2. Does the female in your life hate chocolate? See above.

3. Did you get in a fight over how an outfit looks, or anything about her looks? Tread lightly here. You don't want to find out you aren't supportive of a diet or being healthy or another landmine you might step on.

4. Are you still married? If not, this will not fix a problem that large.

Good luck... and do try giving this before you actually do something stupid. Believe it or not people are much happier with chocolate in their mouth (most of the time).

title: It was supposed to be a gift…
text:
Pro: Irresistable. I was going to give these to a client as a gift, but I decided to eat them and find another gift. The non-standard flavors were interesting.

One slight con:
Call me ignorant, but I didn’t think not being able to tell the difference between the wrapper and the coconut coating (if eating it right out of the wrapper because of the coconut crumbliness) was a qualification for being “fine”, “deluxe”, or anything else this brand wanted as a part of their image. The packaging budget must have ran out by the time they got to the part that touched the coconutty treats. It may have been unwise to choose uniformity over quality in wrapping the most unique product in the set.

I thought of two possible solutions: Have the wrapper come open still in one piece by thickening/toughening the wrapper material, or change the color of the wrapper enough that customers don’t think of the possibility of eating a torn-off wrapper piece.

The customer shouldn’t be left wondering whether they just bit a piece of wrapper off to pair with their coconut coating. One time my great aunt ate a rock, thinking I had just handed her a piece of candy. Some people might bite bits of wrapper if not paying attention.

Nitpicking aside, this product feels perfect for gifting (even to yourself)!

title: Perfection in a can
text:
So refreshing.wonderful flavors just perfect.
As noted by others this (and the rest of the juice flavored sparkling waters from San Pellegrino) have a high sugar and calorie content. At 140 calories and 32 grams of sugar this is not a drink you want to toss down one after another. Although, real fruit drinks tend to be higher in sugar. Good thing is the Sodium count is lower than most soft drinks. So a much better choice for me. Just be aware of the nutritional values and then enjoy a can when you want to treat yourself.

text:
Good day!

I'm a big lover of chocolate, sweets and here appear in the house more often because of the guests who wish to please. So this time we presented a box (or better to say "korobische" Laughing out loud?) Candy Ferrero Colection, seeing that I was just dumbfounded - not every day you give such a luxury!

Inside is very candy in the shape of a ball. Here merge into a beautiful symphony of taste chocolate cream, a full-bodied, moderately greasy and with a slight bitterness, a thin layer of crispy wafer, mouth-watering milk chocolate interspersed with chopped nuts ... All this complements heart candy - whole hazelnuts, introducing their own special flavors.
Until then, I have not tried them, but once tasted, I realized - it's love at first sight! Registration is very tempting and, personally, I have to be associated with the temptation of the night, subdued light, erotic music ...
Sweetie fascinates with its appearance and taste: these little balls noble dark chocolate, which hide the spicy crispy wafer layer, and under it - blazhenstvenny cocoa cream is very rich, with a pleasant bitterness alluring. In the center is the "jewel" - hazelnut, covered with an even layer of dark chocolate.
Rounding out our top three candies that donesut your affection - rafaelki, as I affectionately call them, decorated in pristine white.
The abundance of coconut hides a crunchy wafer layer, under which is a measure of the oil in a sweet vanilla cream, hiding whole almonds.
I think they have not tried unless the lazy lovers SmilePonravyatsya zhirnenky coconut sweets (which I just did not liking).
In conclusion, I can say that a set of simply gorgeous, but very expensive. Here everyone can find a piece of candy to taste, so I think it is good assorted. Luxurious gift and, above all, incredibly delicious!

title: if you're a fan of chocolate like I am, you won't be disappointed!
text:
Ferrero Assorted Chocolate is hands down one of the best chocolate brands out there. The variety of flavors and textures in each box is sure to satisfy any chocolate lover's cravings. And for me, the dark chocolate is a standout favorite.

The quality of the chocolate is unbeatable - it's smooth, creamy, and melts in your mouth. I love that each piece is individually wrapped, making it perfect for sharing or saving for later. And the assortment of flavors means that there's something for everyone, from classic milk chocolate to decadent hazelnut.

Overall, I highly recommend Ferrero Assorted Chocolate to anyone looking for a high-quality and delicious treat. And if you're a fan of dark chocolate like I am, you won't be disappointed!

title: Needs more cold packets/please pack more tightly
text: You guys need to add at least 2 to 3 more cold packets to your product, especially during the summer, only one doesn't keep it from melting somewhat and if the coconut ones overheat, the flavor changes to where it taste egg instead of the original flavor. I've ordered this before when it was cooler outside and the coconut flavor tasted completely different last time, then accidentally left them under the sun and obtained the same egg flavor. Hope this helps/someone sees this because it's generally needed for your product to stay fresh and unchanged. The cold packets do somewhat leak as well. I would say to put the cold packets on top, bottom and on the side, especially since the floor of the truck/ the ground where such is delivered would be hot. Then pack the cardboard that keeps it from moving around the cold packets. And the box was a bit loosely packed, not very tightly sealed. Other than that love the chocolates.

title: Ferrero Collection: A Decadent Assortment of Gourmet Hazelnut Chocolates!
text: From the moment I opened the Ferrero Collection Premium Gourmet Assorted Hazelnut Milk Chocolate, Dark Chocolate, and Coconut, I knew I was in for a treat. As I took my first bite, the creamy hazelnut filling melted into the velvety milk chocolate, creating a symphony of flavors that danced on my taste buds. The richness of the dark chocolate pieces delighted my senses, offering a delightful contrast to the sweetness. And when I tried the coconut-infused chocolates, I was transported to a tropical paradise with each chew. The assortment was elegantly presented, making it a perfect gift for any occasion. With each indulgent piece individually wrapped, I savored the moment, enjoying the luxurious flavors and the pure bliss they brought. The Ferrero Collection truly exceeded my expectations, leaving me with a lasting impression of chocolate perfection.
